name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

name: Blindness
notes: -6 to all combat skills; cannot target hit locations

name: Chronic Pain

modifier.name: Agonizing
modifier.notes: -6 to DX, IQ, and self-control rolls

notes: -2 to DX, IQ and self-control rolls

name: Chummy
notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

name: Chummy (Gregarious)
notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

name: Claws, Blunt (Feet)
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Claws, Blunt (Hands)
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Claws, Hooves
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Claws, Long Talons (Feet)
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Claws, Long Talons (Hands)
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Claws, Sharp (Feet)
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Claws, Sharp (Hands)
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Claws, Talons (Feet)
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Claws, Talons (Hands)
notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

name: Combat Reflexes
notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

modifier.name: Aging
modifier.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

name: Enhanced Time Sense
notes: You immediately act in combat before those without Enhanced Time Sense; Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

name: Fit
notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

name: Fit, Very
notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

name: High Pain Threshold
notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

name: Insomniac (Mild)
notes: GM secretly rolls 3d for the number of days between episodes

name: Insomniac (Severe)
notes: GM secretly rolls 2d-1 for the number of days between episodes

name: Intolerance (@Class, Ethnicity, Nationality, Religion, Sex, or Species@)
Luck
notes: Usable once per hour of play

name: Luck, Extraordinary
notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

name: Luck, Ridiculous
notes: Usable once per 10 minutes of play

name: Luck, Super
notes: Dictate one die roll once per hour of play

modifier.name: Easy to Hit
modifier.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

modifier.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

name: Signature Gear
notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

name: Social Stigma (Minority Group)
notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

modifier.name: Alternate Benefit
modifier.notes: Bonus to rolls to survive made by plants in your care.

modifier.name: Alternate Benefit
modifier.notes: Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.
